Net Cash from Financing Activities: net cash provided by used in financing activities
Other Financing Activities: payments related to tax withholding for share based compensation
issuance of stock and warrants for services or claims
issuance of treasury stock to partially settle debt
proceeds from payments for other financing activities
proceeds from sale and collection of receivables
Proceeds from Debt: proceeds from issuance of commercial paper
proceeds from issuance of long term debt
proceeds from repayments of lines of credit
proceeds from repayments of short term debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
stock issued during period value conversion of convertible securities
stock issued during period value treasury stock reissued
Repayment of Debt: repayments of long term debt and capital securities
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

Acquisitions (net of cash acquired): acquisitions net of cash acquired all others
payments to acquire businesses net of cash acquired
payments to acquire interest in subsidiaries and affiliates
business combination consideration transferred equity interests issued and issuable
Capital Expenditures: capital expenditures incurred but not yet paid
payments to acquire property plant and equipment
Net Cash from Investing Activities: net cash provided by used in investing activities continuing operations
cash provided by used in investing activities discontinued operations
Other Investing Activities: proceeds from divestiture of interest in consolidated subsidiaries
proceeds from sale of property plant and equipment
origination of notes receivable from related parties
Purchases of Investments: payments to acquire available for sale securities
payments to acquire available for sale securities debt
payments to acquire short term investments
Sales and Maturities of Investments: proceeds from maturities prepayments and calls of shortterm investments
proceeds from sale and maturity of available for sale securities
proceeds from sale and maturity of other investments
proceeds from sale of short term investments

Net Change in Cash: cash cash equivalents restricted cash and restricted cash equivalents period increase decrease including exchange rate effect

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in accounts payable related parties
increase decrease in accrued income taxes payable
increase decrease in accrued liabilities and other operating liabilities
increase decrease in due from related parties
increase decrease in due from related parties current
increase decrease in due to related parties
increase decrease in due to related parties current
increase decrease in equity securities fv ni
increase decrease in other operating assets
increase decrease in prepaid deferred expense and other assets
increase decrease in prepaid expense and other current assets
Deferred Income Taxes: deferred income taxes and tax credits
Depreciation and Amortization: amortization of financing costs and discounts
amortization of inventory fair value adjustment
Net Cash from Operating Activities: net cash provided by used in operating activities continuing operations
cash provided by used in operating activities discontinued operations
Other Non-Cash Items: asset impairment charges
deconsolidation gain or loss amount
deferred cash on sold receivables
deferredcashonsoldreceivables
equity securities fv ni gain loss
gain loss on disposition of assets1
gain loss on sale of property plant equipment
gain loss on sale of securities net
gains losses on extinguishment of debt
goodwill impairment loss
impairment of investments
income loss from equity method investments
income loss from equity method investments net of dividends or distributions
income taxes paid net
inventory loss at recovery from contract manufacturer
inventory write down
noncash or part noncash acquisition fixed assets acquired1
other adjustments to income discontinued operations
other noncash income expense
related party noncash transaction
release of reserves for tax liabilities
restructuringand other special charges net noncash
right of use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability

__unmapped__: increase decrease in accounts payable and accrued liabilities
proceeds from issuance of long term debt and proceeds from or repayment of accounts receivable securitization facility net
